website_summaries.verdict: A great piano accordion with an impressive range of notes and chords. You won't find a better budget-priced accordion.
pros: More note and chord choices than any other budget-priced accordion
cons: Volume may be slightly inconsistent from note to note
This flaw could have to do with a user's piano technique

customer_reviews.title: A Barrel of Fun for Kids and/or Adults!
customer_reviews.text: Great little accordion! As mentioned in other reviews, the keys stick but this is easily remedied with liberal doses of WD-40. I've been wanting to learn to play the accordion for years but The entry level price was way to high for something I didn't know I would be able to play. This little machine was perfect for finding out if I would like it. I play piano so it was an easy transition to simple songs...within 24 hours I was playing a reasonable version of "Roll Out The Barrel." Try this before you invest $500 in a full scale model.
customer_reviews.author: Dharma bum's dream

customer_reviews.title: It was the perfect size for her
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 72 year old mother that always had a dream to own an accordion. It was the perfect size for her. Easy to learn. I played a couple of songs on it. It comes with easy music sheet that is fun and easy to play. Nice sound too! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: PickyMomma

customer_reviews.title: ... my 9 year old son who is a very good pianist. He wanted to try the accordion
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old son who is a very good pianist. He wanted to try the accordion, so with the reviews, I thought this was the best one for the money. My son did not like it because some of the notes do not work, it makes a squeaking noise when you move the accordion part back and forth and there is something that rattles when you move it back and forth. I do not think it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Schantz

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much when I bought this, but it is basically a fully functioning mini accordian. I bought it for my 5 year old to play with and it really works! The quality is amazing and a perfect starter accordian for anyone who would want to learn the simple basics of this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Kantz

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Clearly this had been used. It is scratched all over and the directions are missing pages - clearly a copied page that isn't complete. It tells you that on the back of the page are several songs you can play....however there were no other pages included. I couldn't be more disappointed and had to wait several weeks for this in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Jane G Chlapaty

customer_reviews.title: Plays like a large accordian
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old wanted to play accordion. We started with this to see if it was really what he wanted to do. Turns out - yes! And this is a great starter instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn McMullen

customer_reviews.title: I tried to play and going to buy one for ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried to play and going to buy one for my self. This one is my Grandson's Christmas present. He plays one at school and just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: johnnie trimble

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cheaply made instrument (a toy, really) and if the child I bought it for didn't want it so badly, I would have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: poemgirl

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year-old wanted this to be like "Jeff" from The Wiggles. She says, "I love it so much." The straps are adjustable. It is sturdily made-- doesn't easily break. It's very realistic-- it's a real instrument.
customer_reviews.author: R. H. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Stiff Bellows
customer_reviews.text: The bellows are so stiff for a 9 year old! I wonder what to do (apart from playing it to death) to make it easier for a child to play it.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Labrum

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: my grandson nearly lost it when i gave it to him. the look of it is so professional. especially the pearl body. way cool!
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Not built very well
customer_reviews.text: When I got this instrument I thought it was going to be great.. It certainly looked like a miniature instrument. It's built cheesy. My grandson barely used the one that he got for Christmas, and one of the chord buttons is already broken. I haven't taken it apart yet to see if it's fixable, but you get what you pay for and I didn't pay much for this .
customer_reviews.author: Martha E.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Bellows very hard to move
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Bellows very hard to move. makes operation almost impossible. Too hard to play because of bellows lack of movement. Would return if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Mariasis

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but minuscule.
customer_reviews.text: The accordion is indeed of decent quality, but it is a lot smaller than I expected. I ordered it for my 13-year-old, but it is sized to be more suitable for my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working nicely!! Very good for the price - can't beat it, wanted a smaller one to practice on. Ace.
customer_reviews.author: pickleopickle

customer_reviews.title: I like it.  Dog hates it.
customer_reviews.text: I think he's jealous because he doesn't have thumbs. Great toy accordion.
customer_reviews.author: Pstros

customer_reviews.title: but it is not good if one wants to really learn how to play ...
customer_reviews.text: This accordion is okay for a child to play with, but it is not good if one wants to really learn how to play one. I would have preferred getting a good used one, to practice on.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Cute accordion
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the church play. It was very cute and just what I needed. It was not actually played on, but the sound is pretty clean. Sounds better than most children's accordions I had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena Z

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for the youngest grand children. ...
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for the youngest grand children. They can try a real instrument with an adult assisting. It is difficult to find small accordions that can actually play music. Yes, this is a toy but of reasonable quality not be discouraging.
customer_reviews.author: ProjectMan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a torn and taped box held together by rubber bands. Product was not protected in any way. Upon inspecting product, 2 of the buttons didn't work and it was rattling inside when picked up. Will be returning....
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Can make a person cry
customer_reviews.text: This thing has a beautiful sound. It can be harmonious or dissonant, sad or romantic. Quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought my son would like this toy. And he does. Entertains everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Elinor Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot of fun for the kids, but even they say it's too loud.
customer_reviews.author: mary deleal

customer_reviews.title: like myself. Downside
customer_reviews.text: This thing is somewhere between a toy and an actual accordion. It works, you can play stuff on it, absolutely ideal for beginners. like myself. Downside? Its a Toy accordion for 40 bucks! Don't expect quality... Thought that was pretty obvious. a few paint marks and a bit uneven base buttons are a thing. Overall though, definitely do not regret buying. A decent accordion for a very low price. and if you are right now looking for your first accordion (you! no, not you, the one reading this! Yes! You!) Click that "Add to cart button" because i'm pretty sure you will not find anything better for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay

customer_reviews.title: Have always loved this instrument
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved this instrument. Kids are already taking turns figuring out Christmas songs and improvising tunes. Quality so far exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sgreg

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize I was getting what looks like a used toy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize I was getting what looks like a used toy, although it doesn't seem to be damage in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Conner Sowles

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the quality. Strap came off within days :-((
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sounds great for a toy...
customer_reviews.text: this sounds great for a kids toy instrument, even my husband can play music with it. great quality my 2yr old baby girl loves it.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the base buttons some only work if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the base buttons some only work if you pull the bellows hard. Looks cute but not easy for a child to play.
customer_reviews.author: Derick Tickle

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste time, energy, hope or money on this. Gave it a second chance after a disappointment last year. Same disappointment. Same poor quality all around. Poor choice for a toy,even for a very young child who is at all interested in music. Spend considerably less and buy a simple tiny toy accordion....if a toy is what you are looking for; or a bit more and get a real 12 bass small accordion from the well known makers of decent accordions. This is NOT a starter accordion for a child.
customer_reviews.author: TX Florist

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids! Quality sound!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 9 year old daughter. She was surprised and loved the sounds it makes. Now to find an instructor!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Alawine

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason this accordion is so cheap. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason this accordion is so cheap. It's just a toy. It leaks a lot of air, some of the reeds are out of tune, and some of the keys are hard to press. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: This is the most annoying tiny instrument I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the most annoying tiny instrument I've owned, and it's great. Everyone hates it. Even the dogs hate it. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ilya Chugunov

customer_reviews.title: A good first accordian for a 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: My grand son loves it. A good first accordian for a 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who loves music. He's two and the accordion's adjustable straps helps it fit his size. The quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: pammysue

customer_reviews.title: Not playable, stiff bellows, sticking keys.
customer_reviews.text: The keys stick, the bellows is very stiff. My musician, accordion playing husband could not play it. Too much effort for our 7 year old grandson to use. We returned it without any problem thanks to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Awake One

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is just a toy. Do not expect anything other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We have only had it for a couple of weeks and have only allowed close supervised "music" making session with our 3 year old, who loves it, and everything is fine with it. We will have to see how durable it is. The bass buttons feel like they could be pushed into the accordian but otherwise it is fine for the price. It is not something a professional would use but I was not expecting that.
customer_reviews.author: Karlos

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is a total waste of money. It doesn't work at all. Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: ken grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this purchase
customer_reviews.text: One of the Accordions keys messed up on the second day we had it. Very disappointed in this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This really is a toy.
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistake, this is a toy. The sound is nice, but the limited number of chords affects being able to harmonize a melody. The directions are useless, being sparse and written in extremely poor English. When I emailed the company for better directions or for access to music for this accordion, they could only give me a website address for some limited downloads. Unless you have the ability to transcribe melodies so that they can be harmonized with the 4 chords on this accordion , you will be frustrated if you wish to produce good music with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dot Austin

customer_reviews.title: Too fragil to be a toy.  Too low quality to be a instrument.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Timely shipping. Good packaging. Light weight. If you are a accordion player and want to introduce you 6yr to 10yr old kids to the instrument then this is as close as it get. As long as you don't expect any instrumental quality. Cons: The instruction is just teribble. The screws for strap and gril was practically falling out. The bellow makes squeaky noise. Insensitive reeds or leaking air? You have to work the bellow way too much to play. Sound volumne is inconsistent between notes.
customer_reviews.author: Bolero

customer_reviews.title: D'Luca Kids Accordian
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed & hate this product!Never buy it, does not work, bellows too stiff & don't flex, cannot play.
customer_reviews.author: L T

customer_reviews.title: ... for the money but it's a toy and a good toy too
customer_reviews.text: It's OK for the money but it's a toy and a good toy too.
customer_reviews.author: kamran saghafi

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected. My son was excited when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hofstetter

customer_reviews.title: I bought this just to see if I would like to play accordion
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want your kid to ever play accordion this is the way to go. After a couple of minutes they will be so frustrated they will never ask again. I bought this just to see if I would like to play accordion. Out of the box the A key only worked on the out bellows. The C chord button also only worked intermittently. After about 5 minutes of play the C Key started sticking so that you had to stop and flick it up. After about 10 minutes other keys followed. I could have used this money to get a pawn shop or goodwill accordion and been farther ahead. Lessons learned.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Agosta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product and arrived quickly. I have an excellent Christmas gift for our special needs daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Kids Piano Accordion
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Great sound, kinda loud :O) Great colors... VERY Nice!!! I would recommend for any child who loves to make music! My son has Down syndrome and this Accordion is the perfect size! He LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Tia M. Seay

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and I bought it just for fun. Right keys were sticky within first hour. I had to open the box and bent some of the internal sheet metal brackets a little to make it work. Now it is OK. The sound is good though, better than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Burkhard Kefes

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining but not professional
customer_reviews.text: Good for walking around and sitting around the fire... Good enough to accompany a guitar or something... its fun but not professional
customer_reviews.author: McJigs

customer_reviews.title: cool toy
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome accordion because it has keys. The only problem is that the keys stick right out of the box. The price is good so what can you expect. We still like to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Great way to annoy the entire floor
customer_reviews.text: My college roommate hates accordion music, so I bought this on sale. Great way to annoy the entire floor. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Child's accordion
customer_reviews.text: This product should include more instructions or at least where you could acquire them. The accordion works well and is made well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra a Morris

product_meta.title: D'Luca G104-MX Kids Piano Accordion 17 Keys, 8 Bass RWG
product_meta.description: Color:RWGNow young musicians can start to learn the Accordion! Ideal for smaller hands, this Beautiful piano accordion is ideal for any child! The Accordion is a real instrument with 8 bass chord buttons and a 17 key treble keyboard. The Bellows have a satisfying action and can be used to accompany guitar, banjo and percussion. The main body is decorated to make an attractive instrument as well as one that sounds great! This sturdy Accordion incorporates adjustable support straps to hold the accordion comfortably when playing and rubber feet for when you’re not, altogether making a fantastic first instrument for budding Accordion players! Dimensions: 23cm x 23cm x 11cm. The maximum extent of the bellows is over 24cm.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars104 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
